servinfo.title: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Components:For J20 Engine

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly from vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
Remove oil pump with oil pump strainer. Refer to Oil Pump Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for removal.
Remove cylinder head. Refer to Valves and Cylinder Head Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for removal.
Mark cylinder number on all pistons, connecting rods and connecting rod caps.
Clean carbon from top of cylinder bore before removing piston from cylinder.
Push piston and connecting rod assembly out through the top of cylinder bore.

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Disassembly and Assembly:For J20 Engine

s1.ptxt: Apply engine oil to pistons, rings, cylinder walls, connecting rod bearings and crank pins.

attention3.ptxt: Do not apply oil between connecting rod and bearing or between bearing cap and bearing.

s1.ptxt: When installing piston and connecting rod assembly into cylinder bore, point front mark (3) on piston head to crankshaft pulley side (1).
Install piston and connecting rod assembly into cylinder bore. Use special tool (Piston ring compressor) to compress rings. Guide connecting rod into place on crankshaft.
Using a hammer handle, tap piston head to install piston into bore. Hold ring compressor firmly against cylinder block until all piston rings have entered cylinder bore.
Install connecting rod bearing cap (1) as follows.

attention3.ptxt: If connecting rod bolt is reused, make sure to check connecting rod bolt for deformation referring to “Connecting Rod Bolt Deformation (Plastic Deformation Tightening Bolt)” under Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine .

s2.ptxt: Point arrow mark (2) on cap to crankshaft pulley side.
Apply engine oil to new connecting rod bolts (3).
Tighten all connecting rod bolts to 15 N·m (1.5 kgf-m, 11.0 lbf-ft).

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 15 N·m (1.5 kgf-m, 11.0 lbf-ft), 45° and 45° by the specified procedure.

s1.ptxt: Install cylinder head. Refer to Valves and Cylinder Head Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Install oil pan. Refer to Oil Pan and Oil Pump Strainer Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine for installation.
Install engine assembly to vehicle referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine .
